definition: to spoil things through excessive enthusiasm (idiom)
see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]

sentences.english: No doubt inadvertently, Samsung feeds this delusion.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，三星助長了這種錯覺。

sentences.english: And surveillance infrastructure can be exported, which also aids totalitarianism around the world.
sentences.chinese: 監視設施可以出口，這也助長了世界上的極權主義。

sentences.english: Research indicates that self-monitoring increases the probability of keeping the resolution.
sentences.chinese: 研究證明，自控可以助長遵守決議的可能性。

sentences.english: Their refusal to remove the public-house will put a premium on drinking in the district.
sentences.chinese: 他們拒絕遷走那家酒店，這將助長該地區的酗酒風氣。

sentences.english: If Egypt devolves into chaos, it will feed extremism throughout the region.
sentences.chinese: 如果埃及陷入混亂，將助長整個地區的極端主義活動。

sentences.english: The absence of adequate medical care furthered the spread of the disease.
sentences.chinese: 缺醫少藥的情況助長了這種疾病的傳播。

sentences.english: Instead, the online materials appear to be only whetting appetites for more.
sentences.chinese: 反之，似乎是唯一的網上資料更助長饅頭。

sentences.english: Furthermore, rich of information easily abets vogue of copy.
sentences.chinese: 而且，信息富足容易助長抄襲之風。

sentences.english: Appreciate the person who chided you, for furthering your wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 感激斥責你的人，因爲他助長了你的智慧。

sentences.english: To educate the young generation in such a way is just like making the rice shoots grow by pulling them up.
sentences.chinese: 用這種方法教育下一代無異於拔苗助長。

sentences.english: Are there more contributing reasons and causes for the current decrepit state of things?
sentences.chinese: 還有其它的理由和原因助長了目前的衰頹狀況嘛？

sentences.english: Let your ideas cook in May, and don't rush the process by calling or adding subtle pressure.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的好主意在5月萌芽，不要施加壓力拔苗助長。

sentences.english: Teaching children in this way simply means applying too much pressure and damaging them.
sentences.chinese: 用這種方法教育孩子，簡直是拔苗助長。

sentences.english: What factor helped to spread the disease of myxomatosis ?
sentences.chinese: 什麼因素助長了多發性粘液瘤疾病的蔓延？

sentences.english: Therefore this psychology preceded the inundation of Caudillo politics after independence.
sentences.chinese: 在獨立後，這一心態助長了考迪羅主義的泛濫。

sentences.english: Therefore this psychology preceded the inundation of Caudillo politics after …
sentences.chinese: 在獨立後，這一心態助長了考迪羅主義的泛濫。

definition: lit. change to more severe (idiom); to become more intense (esp. of shortcoming)/to aggravate/to intensify
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
